archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Produce Financial Plan
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Financial Plan is requested via Front-End
Inspire controls overall process of Financial plan customization and allows Financial Advisor to store Financial Plan in various formats or deliver it directly to customer. Every Financial Plan delivered is archived.
1. Writer (Financial Planner) inserts Client Financial Details into Front-End 2. Writer reviews Financial Plan using Calculation Engine 3. Writer can make further changes until satisfied with the proposal 4. Requesting System (Front-End) requests document via Inspire Scaler API providing Financial Plan setup (Form data, customer ID etc.) 5. Inspire Scaler requests data via Data Warehouse API using IDs provided in request 6. Inspire Scaler requests Calculation Engine to calculate product profitability by passing product parameters 7. Inspire Interactive creates Financial Plan with customer data 8. Writer reviews and potentially modifies Financial Plan and then can: • Store Locally – store on Local PC or on Front-End, document is still Archived on OM side • Deliver to Customer – deliver to Customer via delivery channel (specified below, continue to step 9) • Delete – delete current Financial Plan 9. Inspire Scaler generates document using Financial Plan data 10. Inspire Scaler formats communication and deliver it via channel passed in the request: • Print – document is stored for Consolidation Process • Email – document is formatted (HTML without JS) and delivered via Email Gateway • Web Portal – document is formatted (HTML with JS) and delivered to Front-End, customer receives email notification 11. Inspire Scaler formats (PDF) and delivers communication to Archive system
